questions.question: Which macOS keyboard shortcut opens Spotlight search?
questions.explain: Command+Space invokes Spotlight system-wide.

questions.question: What is the quickest way to capture a selection screenshot on macOS?
questions.explain: Shift+Command+4 turns the cursor into a crosshair for selection captures.

questions.question: In iTerm2, which shortcut splits the current pane vertically?
questions.explain: Command+D creates a vertical split; Shift+D splits horizontally.

questions.question: What does Command+K do in iTerm2 by default?
questions.explain: Command+K clears the visible buffer without closing the session.

questions.question: Which shortcut opens the Command Palette in VS Code on macOS?
questions.explain: Command+Shift+P opens the Command Palette with all actions.

questions.question: How do you add an extra cursor with the mouse in VS Code on macOS?
questions.explain: Option+Click adds another cursor for multi-editing.

questions.question: Which Git command creates and checks out a new branch named feature/login?
questions.explain: git checkout -b <name> creates the branch and switches to it immediately.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a pull request on GitHub?
choices: To request review and discussion before merging
questions.explain: Pull requests enable code review, discussion, and checks before merging.

questions.question: Which statement best describes a foundation model?
choices: A model trained for one specific downstream task
A broadly pretrained model adapted to many tasks
A model that only runs on mobile devices
A rules engine with hard-coded logic
questions.explain: Foundation models are pretrained on diverse data and fine-tuned for multiple tasks.

questions.question: Which Core Web Vitals metric tracks perceived load speed of the main content?
questions.explain: Largest Contentful Paint measures when the biggest content element renders.

questions.question: What does a Content-Security-Policy (CSP) primarily do?
questions.explain: CSP reduces XSS risk by limiting which origins may supply resources.

questions.question: Which header tells browsers to prefer HTTPS for future requests?
questions.explain: Strict-Transport-Security (HSTS) locks the origin to HTTPS once trusted.

questions.question: What recent feature has Microsoft introduced for Windows 11 users?
questions.explain: Microsoft launched Xbox Copilot for Windows 11, enhancing gaming capabilities on PCs.

questions.question: Which company claims it can remove CO2 using less electricity than competitors?
questions.explain: DACLab has made headlines for its CO2 removal technology that is more energy-efficient than many alternatives.

questions.question: What is the main concern Satya Nadella has regarding Microsoft's future?
choices: B. Not surviving the AI era
questions.explain: Satya Nadella expressed concerns about Microsoft's ability to stay relevant in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

questions.question: What significant change is Microsoft planning with Foxconn's empty buildings?
questions.explain: Microsoft intends to transform Foxconn's unused facilities into a powerful AI data center to enhance its AI capabilities.

questions.question: What recent legal measure aims to block online adult content and VPNs?
questions.explain: A new bill known as the Online Safety Bill is proposed to restrict access to online adult content and VPN services.

questions.question: What product did Microsoft recently launch for Windows 11 PCs?
questions.explain: Microsoft's Xbox Copilot is designed to enhance gaming experiences on Windows 11 PCs.

questions.question: Which company claims to remove CO2 using less electricity than its competitors?
questions.explain: DACLab has announced its capability to remove CO2 more efficiently than many competitors.

questions.question: What concern did Satya Nadella express regarding Microsoft's future?
questions.explain: Satya Nadella expressed concerns about Microsoft's ability to thrive in the AI era.

questions.question: What major development is associated with Microsoft and Foxconn?
questions.explain: Microsoft is converting Foxconn's vacant buildings into a powerful AI data center.

questions.question: What was the key issue in the recent Anker product recall?
questions.explain: Anker's recall of over 481,000 power banks was due to fire hazard concerns.

questions.question: Which company recently announced the launch of Xbox Copilot for Windows 11?
questions.explain: Microsoft's Xbox Copilot is designed to enhance gaming experiences on Windows 11 PCs.

questions.question: What recent concern did Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella express regarding the company's future?
questions.explain: Nadella is worried about Microsoft's ability to thrive in the AI era amid growing competition.

questions.question: What innovative capability does DACLab claim to have in relation to CO2 removal?
choices: C. Less electricity usage than competitors
questions.explain: DACLab claims it can remove CO2 using less electricity than many of its competitors, making it a more efficient option.

questions.question: What recent trend is being seen with the introduction of laws regarding online adult content and VPNs?
questions.explain: A new bill aims to block both online adult content and VPNs, indicating a trend towards stricter regulations.

questions.question: How is Microsoft planning to utilize Foxconn's empty buildings?
choices: C. Establishing an AI data center
questions.explain: Microsoft is converting Foxconn's empty buildings into what it claims will be the 'world's most powerful' AI data center.

questions.question: What recent product has Microsoft launched for Windows 11 PCs?
questions.explain: Microsoft has launched Xbox Copilot for Windows 11 PCs, enhancing gaming experiences with AI assistance.

questions.question: Which company claims to remove CO2 using less electricity than its competitors?
questions.explain: DACLab has announced its capability to remove CO2 efficiently, using less energy compared to other companies in the space.

questions.question: What concern has Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella expressed regarding the company's future?
choices: B. Survival in the AI era
questions.explain: Satya Nadella has voiced concerns about Microsoft's ability to thrive and survive amidst the rapid advancements in AI technology.

questions.question: What has Anker recently recalled due to safety concerns?
questions.explain: Anker recalled over 481,000 power banks due to safety issues, ensuring customer safety and product reliability.

questions.question: What is the goal of the new bill discussed in recent tech news?
choices: B. Block online adult content and VPNs
questions.explain: The new bill aims to restrict access to online adult content and VPNs, raising significant discussions about internet freedom.
